`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`A theme, in the context of NextUI, is a predefined set of colors, layout attributes, and other
UI elements that you can consistently apply across your application. Themes ensure visual
consistency, enrich the user experience, and simplify the management and updates of your
app's look and feel.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:21,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-js",meta:"{8,13-14}",children:`// tailwind.config.js
const {nextui} = require("@nextui-org/react");

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
module.exports = {
  content: [
    // ...
    "./node_modules/@nextui-org/theme/dist/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {},
  },
  darkMode: "class",
  plugins: [nextui()],
};

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",meta:"{11}",children:`// main.tsx or main.jsx
import React from "react";
import ReactDOM from "react-dom/client";
import {NextUIProvider} from "@nextui-org/react";
import App from "./App";
import "./index.css";

ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById("root")).render(
  <React.StrictMode>
    <NextUIProvider>
      <main className="dark text-foreground bg-background">
        <App />
      </main>
    </NextUIProvider>
  </React.StrictMode>,
);
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:61,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:61,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["The ",(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"nextui"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:84,columnNumber:5},this)," plugin provides a default structure. It is outlined as follows:"]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:84,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-js",children:`module.exports = {
  plugins: [
    nextui({
      prefix: "nextui", // prefix for themes variables
      addCommonColors: false, // override common colors (e.g. "blue", "green", "pink").
      defaultTheme: "light", // default theme from the themes object
      defaultExtendTheme: "light", // default theme to extend on custom themes
      layout: {}, // common layout tokens (applied to all themes)
      themes: {
        light: {
          layout: {}, // light theme layout tokens
          colors: {}, // light theme colors
        },
        dark: {
          layout: {}, // dark theme layout tokens
          colors: {}, // dark theme colors
        },
        // ... custom themes
      },
    }),
  ],
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:86,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:86,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"These are the options that you can use to apply custom configurations to your themes."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:113,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-js",meta:"{6-7,10-11}",children:`module.exports = {
  plugins: [
    nextui({
      themes: {
        light: {
          layout: {},
          colors: {}
        },
        dark: {
          layout: {},
          colors: {}
        },
        ... // custom themes
      }
    })
  ]
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:115,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:115,columnNumber:1},this),`

  ...

</html>

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`NextUI enables you to apply TailwindCSS styles based on the currently active theme. Below are
examples of how to do this:`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:150,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-html",children:`<!-- In dark theme, background will be dark and text will be light. 
  In light theme, background will be light and text will be dark -->

<div class="dark dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white bg-white text-black">
  ...
  <div>Text color changes based on theme</div>
</div>

<div class="light light:bg-gray-100 light:text-black bg-black text-white">
  ...
  <div>Text color changes based on theme</div>
</div>
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:153,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:153,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`type ConfigTheme = {
  extend?: "light" | "dark"; // base theme to extend
  layout?: LayoutTheme; // see LayoutTheme
  colors?: ThemeColors; // see ThemeColors
};

type ConfigThemes = Record<string, ConfigTheme>;
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:186,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:186,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.h4,{id:"layouttheme",children:"LayoutTheme"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:196,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`type BaseThemeUnit = {
  small?: string;
  medium?: string;
  large?: string;
};

type FontThemeUnit = {
  small?: string;
  medium?: string;
  large?: string;
  tiny?: string;
};

interface LayoutTheme {
  /**
   * Base unit token that defines a consistent spacing scale across
   * the components.
   */
  spacingUnit?: number;
  /**
   * The default font size applied across the components.
   */
  fontSize?: FontThemeUnit;
  /**
   * The default line height applied across the components.
   */
  lineHeight?: FontThemeUnit;
  /**
   * The default radius applied across the components.
   * we recommend to use \`rem\` units.
   */
  radius?: BaseThemeUnit;
  /**
   * A number between 0 and 1 that is applied as opacity-[value] when
   * the component is disabled.
   */
  disabledOpacity?: string | number;
  /**
   * The default height applied to the divider component.
   * we recommend to use \`px\` units.
   */
  dividerWeight?: string;
  /**
   * The border width applied across the components.
   */
  borderWidth?: BaseThemeUnit;
  /**
   * The box shadow applied across the components.
   */
  boxShadow?: BaseThemeUnit;
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:198,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:198,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.h4,{id:"themecolors",children:"ThemeColors"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:252,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`type ColorScale = {
  50: string;
  100: string;
  200: string;
  300: string;
  400: string;
  500: string;
  600: string;
  700: string;
  800: string;
  900: string;
  foreground: string; // contrast color
  DEFAULT: string;
};

type BaseColors = {
  background: ColorScale; // the page background color
  foreground: ColorScale; // the page text color
  divider: ColorScale; // used for divider and single line border
  overlay: ColorScale; // used for modal, popover, etc.
  focus: ColorScale; // used for focus state outline
  content1: ColorScale; // used for card, modal, popover, etc.
  content2: ColorScale;
  content3: ColorScale;
  content4: ColorScale;
};

// brand colors
type ThemeColors = BaseColors & {
  default: ColorScale;
  primary: ColorScale;
  secondary: ColorScale;
  success: ColorScale;
  warning: ColorScale;
  danger: ColorScale;
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:254,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:254,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:1},this)}function Nn(c={}){let{wrapper:n}=c.components||{};return n?(0,t.jsxDEV)(n,Object.assign({},c,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(Te,c,void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx"},this)}),void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx"},this):Te(c)}var xn=Nn;function vn(c,n,f){throw new Error("Expected "+(n?"component":"object")+" `"+c+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it."+(f?"\nIt\u2019s referenced in your code at `"+f+"` in `D:\\Projects\\avtoolz\\content\\docs\\customization\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0170aa28-5d89-4a90-8ba2-9b1dcdf1624e.mdx`":""))}return _n(yn);})();
